comment:
* A selection event.
 * Specify index parameters as word token indices.

variables.name: ACTION_SMART_SHARE
variables.comment: User clicked the textAssist menu item.

variables.name: ACTION_OTHER
variables.comment: User performed an action on the selection.

variables.name: EVENT_SMART_SELECTION_SINGLE
variables.comment: Smart selection triggered for a single token (word).

variables.name: EVENT_SMART_SELECTION_MULTI
variables.comment: Smart selection triggered spanning multiple tokens (words).

variables.name: EVENT_AUTO_SELECTION
variables.comment: Something else other than User or the default TextClassifier triggered a selection.

variables.name: INVOCATION_MANUAL
variables.comment: Selection was invoked by the user long pressing, double tapping, or dragging to select.

variables.name: INVOCATION_LINK
variables.comment: Selection was invoked by the user tapping on a link.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
public static SelectionEvent createSelectionStartedEvent(@SelectionEvent.InvocationMethod int invocationMethod, int start)
methods.comment:
* Creates a "selection started" event.
     *
     * @param invocationMethod  the way the selection was triggered
     * @param start  the index of the selected text

methods.name: public static SelectionEvent createSelectionModifiedEvent(int start, int end)
methods.comment:
* Creates a "selection modified" event.
     * Use when the user modifies the selection.
     *
     * @param start  the start (inclusive) index of the selection
     * @param end  the end (exclusive) index of the selection
     *
     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if end is less than start

methods.name: public static SelectionEvent createSelectionModifiedEvent(int start, int end, @NonNull TextClassification classification)
methods.comment:
* Creates a "selection modified" event.
     * Use when the user modifies the selection and the selection's entity type is known.
     *
     * @param start  the start (inclusive) index of the selection
     * @param end  the end (exclusive) index of the selection
     * @param classification  the TextClassification object returned by the TextClassifier that
     *      classified the selected text
     *
     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if end is less than start

methods.name: public static SelectionEvent createSelectionModifiedEvent(int start, int end, @NonNull TextSelection selection)
methods.comment:
* Creates a "selection modified" event.
     * Use when a TextClassifier modifies the selection.
     *
     * @param start  the start (inclusive) index of the selection
     * @param end  the end (exclusive) index of the selection
     * @param selection  the TextSelection object returned by the TextClassifier for the
     *      specified selection
     *
     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if end is less than start

methods.name: public static SelectionEvent createSelectionActionEvent(int start, int end, @SelectionEvent.ActionType int actionType)
methods.comment:
* Creates an event specifying an action taken on a selection.
     * Use when the user clicks on an action to act on the selected text.
     *
     * @param start  the start (inclusive) index of the selection
     * @param end  the end (exclusive) index of the selection
     * @param actionType  the action that was performed on the selection
     *
     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if end is less than start

methods.name: public static SelectionEvent createSelectionActionEvent(int start, int end, @SelectionEvent.ActionType int actionType, @NonNull TextClassification classification)
methods.comment:
* Creates an event specifying an action taken on a selection.
     * Use when the user clicks on an action to act on the selected text and the selection's
     * entity type is known.
     *
     * @param start  the start (inclusive) index of the selection
     * @param end  the end (exclusive) index of the selection
     * @param actionType  the action that was performed on the selection
     * @param classification  the TextClassification object returned by the TextClassifier that
     *      classified the selected text
     *
     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if end is less than start
     * @throws IllegalArgumentException If actionType is not a valid SelectionEvent actionType

methods.name: private static void checkActionType(@SelectionEvent.EventType int eventType) throws IllegalArgumentException
methods.comment: * @throws IllegalArgumentException If eventType is not an {@link SelectionEvent.ActionType}

methods.name: public int getEventType()
methods.comment: * Returns the type of event that was triggered. e.g. {@link #ACTION_COPY}.

methods.name: public void setEventType(@EventType int eventType)
methods.comment:
* Sets the event type.
     * @hide

methods.name: public String getEntityType()
methods.comment:
* Returns the type of entity that is associated with this event. e.g.
     * {@link android.view.textclassifier.TextClassifier#TYPE_EMAIL}.

methods.name: public String getPackageName()
methods.comment: * Returns the package name of the app that this event originated in.

methods.name: void setSystemTextClassifierMetadata(@Nullable SystemTextClassifierMetadata systemTcMetadata)
methods.comment:
* Sets the information about the {@link SystemTextClassifier} that sent this request.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public SystemTextClassifierMetadata getSystemTextClassifierMetadata()
methods.comment:
* Returns the information about the {@link SystemTextClassifier} that sent this request.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public String getWidgetType()
methods.comment: * Returns the type of widget that was involved in triggering this event.

methods.name: public String getWidgetVersion()
methods.comment: * Returns a string version info for the widget this event was triggered in.

methods.name: public void setTextClassificationSessionContext(TextClassificationContext context)
methods.comment:
* Sets the {@link TextClassificationContext} for this event.
     * @hide

methods.name: public int getInvocationMethod()
methods.comment: * Returns the way the selection mode was invoked.

methods.name: public void setInvocationMethod(@InvocationMethod int invocationMethod)
methods.comment:
* Sets the invocationMethod for this event.
     * @hide

methods.name: public String getResultId()
methods.comment: * Returns the id of the text classifier result associated with this event.

methods.name: public long getEventTime()
methods.comment: * Returns the time this event was triggered.

methods.name: public long getDurationSinceSessionStart()
methods.comment:
* Returns the duration in ms between when this event was triggered and when the first event in
     * the selection session was triggered.

methods.name: public long getDurationSincePreviousEvent()
methods.comment:
* Returns the duration in ms between when this event was triggered and when the previous event
     * in the selection session was triggered.

methods.name: public int getEventIndex()
methods.comment: * Returns the index (e.g. 1st event, 2nd event, etc.) of this event in the selection session.

methods.name: public SelectionEvent setEventIndex(int index)
methods.comment: @hide

methods.name: public TextClassificationSessionId getSessionId()
methods.comment: * Returns the selection session id.

methods.name: public SelectionEvent setSessionId(@Nullable TextClassificationSessionId id)
methods.comment: @hide

methods.name: public int getStart()
methods.comment:
* Returns the start index of this events relative to the index of the start selection
     * event in the selection session.

methods.name: public SelectionEvent setStart(int start)
methods.comment: @hide

methods.name: public int getEnd()
methods.comment:
* Returns the end index of this events relative to the index of the start selection
     * event in the selection session.

methods.name: public SelectionEvent setEnd(int end)
methods.comment: @hide

methods.name: public int getSmartStart()
methods.comment:
* Returns the start index of this events relative to the index of the smart selection
     * event in the selection session.

methods.name: public SelectionEvent setSmartStart(int start)
methods.comment: @hide

methods.name: public int getSmartEnd()
methods.comment:
* Returns the end index of this events relative to the index of the smart selection
     * event in the selection session.

methods.name: public SelectionEvent setSmartEnd(int end)
methods.comment: @hide

methods.name: public static boolean isTerminal(@EventType int eventType)
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the eventType is a terminal event type. Otherwise returns false.
     * A terminal event is an event that ends a selection interaction.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
public static SelectionEvent createSelectionStartedEvent(@SelectionEvent.InvocationMethod int invocationMethod, int start)
public static SelectionEvent createSelectionModifiedEvent(int start, int end)
public static SelectionEvent createSelectionModifiedEvent(int start, int end, @NonNull TextClassification classification)
public static SelectionEvent createSelectionModifiedEvent(int start, int end, @NonNull TextSelection selection)
public static SelectionEvent createSelectionActionEvent(int start, int end, @SelectionEvent.ActionType int actionType)
public static SelectionEvent createSelectionActionEvent(int start, int end, @SelectionEvent.ActionType int actionType, @NonNull TextClassification classification)
private static void checkActionType(@SelectionEvent.EventType int eventType) throws IllegalArgumentException
public static boolean isTerminal(@EventType int eventType)
